DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study test method prevent weight gain normal-weight overweight woman age 25 44 . Participants complete brief questionnaire health , eat exercise habit , use weight control strategy . They randomly assign 1 3 treatment condition . All 3 treatment receive information importance maintain healthy body weight , component healthy diet , way increase activity level . The 3 treatment differ information deliver . At 12 , 24 36 month enrol study , participant attend assessment session . They complete questionnaire body weight measure .
DOC.criteria: Body mass index 21 30 Presence chronic disease precludes regular physical activity change dietary intake Currently receive treatment psychological disorder Currently pregnant give birth within last 12 month Use last 3 month weight loss medication drug affect body weight Participation weight loss program last 12 month Planning relocate outside study area next 3 year
